body:
Just as a data point: on my Windows 10.0.18363 with `en-US` as the current culture, I don't see the problem.
What is your current culture (`$PSCulture`)?

> out-lineoutput: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')

Something was wrong when printing the properties of the `w32time` service object. Can you run `Get-Service w32time | Select-Object *` again, then run `Get-Error` and paster the output here?

@daxian-dbw 

```

er 'startIndex')

geException
```

@LqkUWp Thanks for sharing the error! Can you please also run the following and share the results?
```
## this may result in the same failure
Get-Service w32time | Format-List *
```
and
```
Get-Service w32time | % Description
```
Also, the windows size and buffer size when you run into this exception:
```
"Window width: $([System.Console]::WindowWidth)"
"Window height: $([System.Console]::WindowWidth)"
"Buffer width: $([System.Console]::BufferWidth)"
"Buffer width: $([System.Console]::BufferHeight)"
```

@daxian-dbw 

* `Get-Service w32time | Format-List *`

  the result is 

  ```
  UserName            : NT AUTHORITY\LocalService
  out-lineoutput: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')
  ```

* `Get-Service w32time | % Description`

  the result is 

  ```
  维护在网络上的所有客户端和服务器的时间和日期同步。如果此服务被停止，时间和日期的同步将不可用。如果此服务被禁用，任何明确依赖它的服务都将不能启动。
  ```

* windows size and buffer size

  ```
  PS> "Window width: $([System.Console]::WindowWidth)"
  Window width: 90
  PS> "Window height: $([System.Console]::WindowHeight)"
  Window height: 27
  PS> "Buffer width: $([System.Console]::BufferWidth)"
  Buffer width: 90
  PS> "Buffer height: $([System.Console]::BufferHeight)"
  Buffer height: 27
  ```
Thanks @LqkUWp, we should be able to repro the issue with the provided information.
